oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Appalachian Exposition, Ohio Society, 1910
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Appalachian Exposition, Knoxville, Tenn. Ohio. Ohio Society, October 3, 1910. Larew Printing Co., Knoxville, Tenn. Paper badge or ribbon. (Torn; in two pieces). Ephemera.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Exhibitions; Badges; Fairs;
